dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
S8/21/2007 S3:13 [private] PAGE 51 
From the Copyright Desk: Sulake Corporation 
To Whom It May Concern: 
Please take this letter as Notice of Infringement of Section 512c of the 
US Copyright Law (Digital Millennium Copyright Act). 
A Network Inquiry brought up your name as hosting these sues: 
vk$IvqLeRftLQQm 
I wish to report what I feel in good faith is an instance of Copyright Infringement and must request the prompt removal of material detailed below from your service. The material which I contend belongs to Sulake Inc and appears illegally on these sites is the following: 
1. Selling our images for cash without permission. 
My contact information is [private]. [private] CA [private]
Our copyright listed in the Library of Congress is 
Regisntion Number TX-6-514-407 rifle: 
Habbo licensing program : style guide 1.0. 
Note: Cataloged from appl. only. 
Claimant acsuleke Corporation, Ltd. Created: 2008 
Published: 1Feb08 
Registered; 28Feb07 
118 
I hereby confirm, that I awn authorized to act on behalf of the owner 
of the copyright for habbohotel.com. The owner of this copyright IS 
Sulake NA Ltd. 
www habhohotel.com is an online graphical chat and gaming 
environment for teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where 
each user is represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos. can walk, talk 
and dance in all Of the haters public and private rooms, Private rooms 
are created by the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo 
Credits. Users purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment 
methods, such as credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone 
lines and cheques. 
Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
